subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Elian Herrera got five hits while filling in for shortstop Jean Segura, and the Milwaukee Brewers ended a seven-game losing streak by routing the St. Louis Cardinals, 11-2, at home Sunday.
snippet: Elian Herrera got five hits while filling in for shortstop Jean Segura, and the Milwaukee Brewers ended a seven-game losing streak by routing the St. Louis Cardinals, 11-2, at home Sunday.
